name: reinfestation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the return of a large number of animals or insects, usually ones that cause damage or disease, to a place where they were before: This cream protects against reinfestation for up to three months. The vet advised us to keep checking the ears for signs of re-infestation. It is impossible to guarantee that there will be no reinfestations. Related word
infestation
More examplesFewer examplesRemoving the nitslice eggs by hand helps to prevent reinfestation.The family don't know where the insects came from and are concerned about re-infestation.
